page.title: 12A Typical Weekend
page.content: 8.3O Get up and get dressed 9.OO Make tea for mum & dad 9.3O Feed pets. Have breakfast - tea or coffee and toast 1O.3OStart washing up, then shopping in town or at Sunday market 12.3ODad reads newspaper, Mum starts cooking lunch of chicken, sweet corn and potatoes 13.3OEat lunch then wash up 14.OOPlay outside, ride BMX bike, or go out in car to visit friends 17.OOHave tea, bread and jam, cakes 17.3OPlay or read books l8.OODo homework 19.OOWatch TV or play piano 21.OOHave a bath and go to bed
